Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add biological day clock and improve sleep entry workflow

- Add circular clock showing biological day \(wake-to-bedtime\)
- Show sunrise/sunset icons with time labels on clock
- Display recommended nap windows as pill-shaped elements
- Add "Woke Up", "Nap", "Bedtime" action buttons on Today screen
- Add wake-up entry type to SleepForm with datetime picker
- Show night entries as bedtime cards with sunset icon
- Fix wake-up times to display on correct day in sleep log
- Improve collision modal to show full date and ongoing status
- Add recommended schedule calculation based on baby''s age

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

memories: Baby Sleep Tracker - Comandos del proyecto: npm run dev (servidor de desarrollo en localhost:5173), npm run build (compilar TypeScript y construir para producción), npm run lint (ejecutar ESLint), npm run preview (previsualizar build de producción)
